argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringnegmul.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | ringnegmul.2 | |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 3 |  | ringnegmul.3 | |- X = ran G |
| 4 |  | ringnegmul.4 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_rneqi | |- ran G = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_eqtri | |- X = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` H ) = ( GId ` H ) |
| 8 | 6, 2, 7 | #P_rngo1cl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( GId ` H ) e. X ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_rngonegcl | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( GId ` H ) e. X ) -> ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) e. X ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_mpdan | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) e. X ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_rngoass | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) e. X /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H A ) H B ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H ( A H B ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3exp2 | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) e. X -> ( A e. X -> ( B e. X -> ( ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H A ) H B ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H ( A H B ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_mpd | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( A e. X -> ( B e. X -> ( ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H A ) H B ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H ( A H B ) ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3imp | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H A ) H B ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H ( A H B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 7 | #P_rngonegmn1l | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H A ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H A ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) H B ) = ( ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H A ) H B ) ) |
| 18 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_rngocl | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A H B ) e. X ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( A H B ) e. X ) |
| 20 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 7 | #P_rngonegmn1l | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( A H B ) e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A H B ) ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H ( A H B ) ) ) |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( N ` ( A H B ) ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H ( A H B ) ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_3impb | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A H B ) ) = ( ( N ` ( GId ` H ) ) H ( A H B ) ) ) |
| 23 | 14, 17, 22 | #P_3eqtr4rd | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A H B ) ) = ( ( N ` A ) H B ) ) |
